Text:
Would somebody please seed this?  There are many of us at 99.5%.

Thank you!
it finally finished and what?!   .ape.cue file that doesnt work.   any ideas?

Ape files? Were you abused by your mother? Sodomized by rabid honey badgers? Just what inspired them? They are a PITA to parse, gigantic, and generally silly. The only thing worse than a FLAC is an ape.

Good stuff if you can get past the format without banging your head on your keyboard too much.

Look at this link for help on decoding ape files.

http://www.simplehelp.net/2007/05/13/how-to-convert-ape-files-to-mp3-using-windows/
